title: Kidnap & ransom (K&R) insurance policies
dataVerified: Insured organization, covered individuals, ransom limit, response team, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake K&R insurance. Domain binding verifies insurer. Extremely sensitive coverage (policies kept confidential). High ransom limits ($10M+ typical for executives). Crisis response team verification.
